attributes.action: Start a trial of Chloroquine as a treatment for Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details:
Initial results show that it can improve outcomes but requires controlled tests. This compound is an anti malarial and is even available over the counter. We request that the Chief Medial Officer and the Prime Minister urgently begin a controlled trial of this treatment in patients who test positive for Covid-19 in the UK.
Data relating to possible treatments:
https://www.pharmacytimes.com/news/potential-pipeline-medications-for-the-coronavirus
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15351731
attributes.background: Following on from research in Australia, we call on the UK government to trial Chloroquine as a treatment for infected persons who have contracted Covid-19. This treatment is readily available, cheap to produce, and is patent-free.

rejection.details: Decisions on treatments are a matter for doctors, in conjunction with the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE).
